messages.content: Hey, it's Lilibeth. How are you holding up?
Not great. I miss my best friend so much.
I'm so sorry. What was your favorite memory with her?
We used to spend every Saturday together. We would go to the park and then get ice cream. Just talking and laughing together was the best part.
That sounds really nice. I'm sure you'll make new memories with other friends, but it's totally natural to miss her right now.
Yeah, I guess you're right. Thanks for talking to me.
Hi, Mitzy. You seem a little down today. Is everything okay?
Oh, hi. Yeah, I'm just a bit stressed out lately. It's been tough to keep up with everything.
I completely understand. It sounds like you could really use a pick-me-up then.
A pick-me-up? What do you mean?

Well, something to make you feel better or take your mind off of things for a while. Here, let me show you what I mean. *reaches into pocket and pulls out a small wrapped present* This is for you. I saw it and thought of you right away.
Awww, that's so sweet of you! Thank you so much!
Hey, are you okay? You look like you could use a hug.
Yeah, I'm fine. Just feeling a little down lately.
Aww, I'm sorry to hear that. Here, give me a hug.
Thank you.
No problem. I hope that helped make you feel better.
Yeah, it did. Thanks for being understanding and caring.
Hey, it's okay. I'm here for you.
I know. I just feel so lost right now.
I can imagine. But you're not alone, I promise. We'll get through this together.
Thank you. Just knowing you're here for me makes me feel a little better already.
Of course, anything for you. So, what do you want to talk about?
I don't know...everything, I guess?
Okay, let's start with what's been going on at work then.
Yeah, that sounds like a good place to start...
Hi, Bethany. I'm so sorry to hear about your dog. Can I get you a drink of water?
Yes, thank you. That would be great.
Here you go. Let me know if you need anything else.
Thank you.
I'm really sorry about your dog, Bethany. Is there anything I can do to help you feel better?
Just being here with me is a big help. Thank you.
Hi, are you okay? You look a little down.
Yeah, I'm just feeling a little down today.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Is there anything I can do to help make you feel better?
Well, maybe getting me a drink or something to eat would help.

Okay, sure. I'll be right back.
Here you go. I hope this helps.
Thank you. It does help. I appreciate it.
Hey, it's okay. I'm here for you.
I just feel so lost right now.
You're not lost. I'm here with you. We'll get through this together.
But what if we can't?
We will, because we're in this together.
Thank you.
Hey, Taliyah. I saw that you didn't make the basketball team. I'm sorry.
It's fine. I'm not good enough anyway.
That's not true! You're a great player! I'm sure you just didn't make it because there were too many other people trying out.
Maybe. But it still sucks.

Yeah, I know how you feel. When I was in seventh grade, I really wanted to be on the cheerleading squad but I didn't make it either. It felt terrible at first but eventually, I got over it and realized that there are other things that are more important than being on a team. And even though we're not on the same team, we're still friends, right?
Yeah, of course we are!
Hey, Shruti. I noticed you were having a tough day today. Are you doing alright?
Yeah, I'm doing alright. Thanks for asking. It's just been one of those days, you know?
I completely understand. Here, let me fix you a drink. It'll make you feel better.
Thank you. That's really sweet of you.
It's no problem at all. I just want to make sure you're okay.
I appreciate it.
So, what's been going on? What's been bothering you?
It's just work, you know. It's been really stressful lately and I can't seem to get ahead.
That sounds rough. I'm sure it'll all work out in the end, though. You're a tough cookie, Shruti.
Thanks. Just hearing you say that makes me feel a little better already.
Good! That's what I wanted to hear. Now drink up and relax a little bit, okay?
Alright, thanks again.
I've really enjoyed talking to you, Weldon. I was wondering if you might want to go out sometime?
I'd love to! I'm so sick of being cooped up in this house all the time. When were you thinking?
How about Friday night?
That sounds great! What should we do?
Well, there's a new movie out that I've been wanting to see. We could go see that and then grab dinner afterwards.
That sounds like a perfect date! I'll see you on Friday then.
I really like you, Jalan. I think you're pretty and I think you're a good person.
Thanks. I appreciate that. I like you too.
I'm glad we like each other. I think we could be really good friends.
I agree. I think we could be great friends.
Hey, are you okay? You looked really upset back there.
Yeah, I'm fine. I just can't believe that happened. It was so humiliating.
I know. It's tough when something like that happens unexpectedly. But you handled it well, considering the circumstances.
Thanks. I guess I just feel like such a fool right now. Everyone must think I'm an idiot.

Don't worry about what other people think. They don't know what it's like to be in your shoes and they're not worth your time or energy anyway. Just focus on how you're feeling and what you need to do to take care of yourself right now.
Yeah, I guess you're right. Thanks for understanding.
Dyllon, are you feeling any better?
Yes, thank you. The pain is subsiding a bit.
Good. I'm glad I could help.
Me too. It's really sweet of you to care so much.
Of course! You're my friend and I want you to feel better.
Thank you. I appreciate it.
It'll be okay, Kevion. I promise. Whatever you're worried about, we'll face it together.
I don't know if I can do this. I'm so scared.
You're not alone, Kevion. I'm here with you. We'll get through this together.
Thank you. Just knowing you're here with me makes me feel a little better.
That's what friends are for, right? To help each other through tough times?
Yes, thank you for being my friend.
Clarice, I'm so sorry about what happened. I know it's hard to lose someone you care about. But I promise you, everything will be alright.
I don't know. I just feel so lost right now.
I understand how you feel. But like I said, things will get better. Here, let me tell you a joke to cheer you up. Why did the chicken cross the road?
To get to the other side!
Ryver, you've been moping around the house all day. I think you could use some fresh air.
Yeah, I guess you're right.
Why don't you go into town and get some coffee or something?
Yeah, that sounds like a good idea. Thanks.
You're welcome. Have a great time!
Hey. I'm back.
Hey! How was your time in town?
It was great, actually. I got some coffee and ended up walking around for a bit. The change of scenery was really what I needed.
Hey, you look cold. Here, take my blanket.
Thanks. I'm really cold.
It's no problem. I can't stand to see you suffer.
I appreciate it. This blanket is really warm.
I'm glad it's helping. Let me know if you need anything else, okay?
Will do. Thanks again.
Hey Tariah. How are you doing?
I'm okay, I guess. Just feeling a little down lately.

Yeah, I can understand that. I've been through some tough times myself. But I've found that cooking my favorite meal and then eating it with someone I care about always makes me feel better. Would you like me to make you something special and bring it over to your place?
Wow, that's really sweet of you. Yes, I would love that. Thank you so much!
You're welcome, Tariah. I'll see you soon.
Thank you again.
I'm so sorry to hear that you're not feeling well, Cambri. I wanted to make you your favorite meal to try and make you feel better.
Thank you so much. I really appreciate it. This is exactly what I needed.
I'm just glad I could help. Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you.
Actually, there is one thing...
Sure, anything. Just name it.
Well, I've been feeling a little cooped up in this room lately and I was wondering if maybe you could take me for a walk outside?
Hey Gary, how's it going?
It's going okay, I guess.
You seem a little down today. What's wrong?
I don't really have any friends. Everyone always seems to be busy or they just don't want to talk to me.
That sounds really tough. I'm sorry that you're feeling that way.
It's just hard sometimes, you know? Feeling like you're the only one who is alone all the time.
Yeah, I know how that feels. But I'm here for you, Gary. We can be friends if you want.
Really? You'd want to be friends with me?
Of course! I think you're a great guy and I'd love to get to know you better.
Thank you. I'd like that.
Hey, Elliot. I feel like you're not really trying your best lately and it's disappointing me. I know you can do better than this. What's going on?
I'm sorry. I know I haven't been performing as well as I should have been. It's just that things have been tough for me lately and I've been struggling to keep up.
What kind of things have been tough for you? Maybe I can help you out if I know what's going on.
It's just personal stuff. I don't really want to talk about it.
Okay, well maybe we can talk about something else then. How are your classes going? Have you been studying hard for your exams?
Yeah, classes are fine. And yeah, I've been studying a lot too. But it's just hard to focus sometimes when there's so much going on in my head.
Well, maybe we can study together sometime then. That way we can keep each other accountable and make sure that we're both staying on top of our work. Would that be okay with you?
Yeah, that would be great actually. Thank you.
Hey, Cameryn. I saw you walking to school this morning and I wanted to catch up with you. How are you feeling about starting middle school?
I'm feeling a little nervous. It's all so new and different. But seeing you here makes me feel better.
Yeah, I remember how scary it was starting middle school too. But it's not so bad once you get used to it. And if you ever need any help, just let me know. I'll be there for you.
Thank you. Just knowing that you're here for me makes me feel a lot better.
Hi, Mecca. You look like you're having a tough day.
Yeah, I am. I feel like I'm not doing well at my job and it's really discouraging me.
That sounds tough. Can I talk with you about it?
Sure.
Well, first of all, how long have you been feeling this way?
For a few weeks now. I just can't seem to get ahead no matter how hard I try.

Okay, that's understandable. It sounds like you're really putting a lot of pressure on yourself to succeed. Maybe you need to take some time to relax and rejuvenate so that you can come back to your work with fresh eyes and new energy. What do you think?

Yeah, that makes sense. I definitely need to take some time for myself or else I'm just going to keep feeling overwhelmed and stressed out. Thank you for talking with me. This has helped a lot already.
Don't worry about it, you're a good student. You'll do fine.
But what if I don't? I've been having so much trouble with math lately.
Have you been studying?
Yeah, but it's just not clicking.
Well, maybe we can go over some of the material together. Would that help?
Yeah, maybe. Thanks.
It's really raining out there, huh?
Yeah. It's been raining all day.
It's like a big blanket, covering everything and making everything wet.
Yeah. I hate the rain.
Why do you hate the rain?
I don't know. It just makes me feel bad.
Well, maybe it's because you're already feeling down and the rain just makes it worse.
Yeah, that might be it.
But you know what they say, April showers bring May flowers. So maybe this rain will bring some good things your way.
I hope so. Thanks for cheering me up.
Hey, it's okay. Everyone makes mistakes. I'm sure you'll do better next time.
Yeah, I guess so. Thanks for understanding.
Of course! I know how you feel. I've been there before too.
Really?
Yeah, totally. We all have our off days. Just pick yourself up and keep going, okay? You're strong and capable, Cedric. I know you can do it!
Thanks. Just hearing you say that makes me feel a lot better.
You seem really stressed out, Zenobia. What's going on?
I'm just having a tough time lately. I don't know what to do.
Well, let me help you relax. I'll give you a head massage.
Thank you. That would be great.
Okay, close your eyes and let me work my magic.
All right.
Just breathe deeply and try to relax. I'll take care of everything else.
Thank you. This feels really good.
Hey, Shianna. How are you feeling today?
I'm feeling a bit sad and scared today.
It's okay to feel that way. Can you tell me more about what's making you feel that way?
I guess I'm just feeling really overwhelmed right now. Everything seems so uncertain and I don't know what's going to happen next.
Yeah, I can understand that. These are definitely strange and worrying times we're living in. But you know, we'll get through this together. I'm always here for you, no matter what happens.
Thank you. That means a lot to me.
Hey Athan, I made this nest for you to sit in. I wanted you to be able to relax and see the outside.
Oh, thank you so much. This is really sweet of you.
No problem, I just wanted to make you feel better.
It's really cozy in here. I appreciate it.
Yeah, no problem. So how are you feeling?
A little better, thanks to you.
Hey, Nancy, you look a little tired. Why don't you drink some water? It'll make you feel better.
I don't really want to, but maybe you're right. I'll give it a try.
Good idea. Here, have a whole glass. You need to stay hydrated, especially in this heat.
Alright, thank you. I feel a little better already.
You're welcome. Just make sure you keep drinking water throughout the day, okay?
I will, thank you.
Hey, Davidson. I brought you a teddy bear and a get-well card.
Aww, thank you! That's really sweet of you.
No problem. I wanted to come and cheer you up. How are you feeling?
I'm feeling a little better, but I'm still pretty tired.
Yeah, being sick is never fun. But I'm glad you're feeling better.
Thanks. It's nice to have a friend like you to talk to.
I'm here for you, Arianne. I know this must be really tough for you.
Thank you. I appreciate your support. It means a lot to me.
Of course. I care about you a lot, and I want to help you through this however I can.
That's really sweet of you. Just knowing that you're here for me makes me feel a little better already.
Good. I'm glad I can be of some help. Do you want to talk about what happened?
Yeah, I think that would actually be helpful. Thanks for being willing to listen.
Hey, I'm sorry you're feeling down. I hope this note makes you feel better.
Thanks. It's nice of you to think of me.
Of course! I care about you, Mariajose. You're one of my best friends.
Aww, thanks. That really means a lot to me right now.
So what's been going on? Why are you feeling down?

It's just been a tough week, you know? First of all, my grandma died and it's been really hard to deal with that. On top of that, I've been having some problems at home and at school. I just feel like everything is piling up on me right now and I can't handle it all.
Oh no, Mariajose! I had no idea things were so tough for you right now. I'm here for you though, okay? You can talk to me about anything that's going on.
Thanks. Just knowing that you're here for me makes me feel a little better already.
Sandro, I'm so sorry that happened. I know it's hard to deal with right now, but I want you to know that I'm here for you.
Thank you. Just knowing you're here makes me feel a little better.
You're going to get through this, Sandro. I promise.
It's just all so overwhelming right now.
I know, but like I said, I'm here for you and we'll get through this together. Just take it one day at a time.
Thanks. You're a really good friend.
Hey, I wanted to talk to you about something.
What's up?
I just wanted to let you know that I think you're a really great friend. You've always been there for me, and I appreciate that.
Thanks. I appreciate your friendship too.
I know you're going through a tough time right now, and I just wanted to let you know that I'm here for you.
Thank you. That means a lot to me.
If there's anything I can do to help you, please let me know.
I appreciate that. Thanks for being such a good friend.
Hey, are you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine. Just a little tired.
You sure? You look like you've been crying.
I have been crying. My mom just died.
Oh my god, I'm so sorry! Here, come sit with me.
Thanks.
I can't believe your mom died. How are you doing?
I'm not really sure. It hasn't hit me yet, I think.
Yeah, it takes a while to process something like that. If you ever want to talk about it, I'm here for you.
Thanks.
I'm glad you're feeling better.
Yeah, I am too. Thank you for talking to me.
Of course. Anytime you need to talk, I'm here for you.
Thanks. That means a lot to me.
It's no problem, really. I'm just glad I could help.
You're a good friend. I'm really lucky to have you in my life.
Hey, Avraham. I just wanted to give you a message.
What is it?
You're beautiful, smart, and loved.
Thank you. That really means a lot coming from you.
Hey, I just wanted to make sure you're doing alright after what happened the other day.
Yeah, I'm doing alright. I appreciate you checking on me.
Of course. I was just worried about you after seeing what happened. Do you want to talk about it?
Not really. It was just a lot to take in and I'm still processing it all.
Yeah, I can imagine. It's been a lot for everyone. But if you ever need to talk about it, I'm here for you.
Thanks. That means a lot to me.
It'll be all right.
Oh, I hope so. I really don't know what I would do if something happened to him.
You would manage, just like you always have. You're a strong woman, Takiyah.
Thank you. That means a lot coming from you. You've always been such a good friend to me.
Any time, Takiyah. Now, why don't you try to get some sleep? I'm sure everything will look better in the morning.
Yeah, maybe you're right. Thanks again.
No problem. Goodnight, Takiyah.
Goodnight.
Hi, Amerie. I'm so sorry about what happened earlier. I didn't mean to upset you.
It's okay. I know you were just trying to help. But it's just been a really tough day for me and I'm feeling really sensitive right now.
Of course. I completely understand. Do you want to talk about what happened? I'm here to listen if you need to talk.
No, I don't think so. I just need some time to myself right now. But thank you for being here for me. It means a lot.
You're welcome, Amerie. I'm always here for you. Just let me know if you need anything, okay?
Okay. Thanks.
Hey Kamarion, I wanted to tell you that you look great. You have an amazing body and are really sexy.
Oh wow, thank you! I appreciate you saying that. I work hard to stay in shape and it's nice to know that it's paying off.
Yeah, definitely. You look like you're in great shape and it's really hot.
Thanks again, coming from you that means a lot.
I'm sorry that you're feeling so lost, Akram. Let me help you find what you need. We'll start with the basics, like shampoo and conditioner. Where do you usually keep those in your bathroom at home?
I don't really have a set place for them. I just put them wherever there's room.
Okay, well in this store, they're over here on the left side of the aisle. Let's grab a couple of bottles and then we can move on to other things.
Thank you. I appreciate your help.
Of course! That's what friends are for, right? Now, let me see... it looks like we have a few different options for shampoo and conditioner. Do you have any preference?
Not really. Whatever smells good, I guess.
Alright, how about this one? It's got a nice floral scent. Or we could try this one that's more fruity smelling.
The floral one sounds good.
Hi, Darrion. What's up?
Hey. I'm just a little stressed out about my math test coming up.
Oh, I completely understand. Math can be pretty tough sometimes. Do you want me to help you study for it?
That would be great, thanks.
Okay, let's go over some of the practice problems together. I think that will help you feel more confident about the material.
Alright, sounds good.
So, this first problem looks a little tricky. What do you think we should do?
Hmmm, well, I'm not sure. I think we could try solving it using the quadratic equation.
I'm sorry to hear that you're having a bad day. It sounds like it's been really tough.
Yeah, it has been. I just feel like I can't catch a break lately. Everything seems to be going wrong.
That definitely sounds tough. I'm here for you though, so if you need to talk, I'm all ears.
Thanks. Just knowing that you're here for me makes me feel a little better already.
Of course, Dalen. That's what friends are for. So, tell me what's been going on?
Well, I've just been feeling really overwhelmed lately. My job is really demanding and I'm just not sure how much longer I can keep doing it.
That sounds like a lot to handle. Have you talked to your boss about how you're feeling?
Yeah, I have. But they're just not understanding. They keep giving me more and more work to do and it's just too much.
Well, maybe you could try talking to them again or looking for a new job. Sometimes change can be really good for us.
Yeah, that's true. I've been thinking about looking for a new job actually. But it's just so hard to find the time to do that with everything else going on in my life right now.
Do you want me to help you look? We could do it together.
That would be great! Thank you so much. Just knowing that I have your support makes me feel a lot better already.
I'm sorry that happened, it must have been really hard for you.
Yeah, it was pretty tough. I don't know why she did it, but it really hurt.
Well, I can understand why you're feeling so upset. It's totally natural to feel that way after something like this happens.
I just wish I knew why she did it. It doesn't make any sense.
Sometimes people do things that don't make sense to us. But that doesn't mean we should give up on them.
I guess you're right. Thanks for talking to me. It really helped a lot.
Hey, Gryffin. I know you're feeling down, so I went out and got your favorite ice cream.
Thanks. That was really thoughtful of you.
Yeah, no problem. I just wanted to make you feel better.
It's appreciate it. This chocolate mint ice cream is my favorite.
I know! That's why I got it for you.
Thanks again. You're a really good friend.
Keondre, you mean the world to me. You're the best friend I've ever had and I'll always be there for you.
Thanks. That means a lot to me. I don't know what I would do without you.
I'm just glad I can be here for you, Keondre. You deserve the best and I'll always try to be there for you, no matter what.
That means a lot to me. Thank you so much.
Hi, Fay. You seem upset. What's wrong?
I'm having a really bad day. Everything is going wrong.
That sounds rough. I'm sorry to hear that. Do you want to talk about it?

Yeah, I guess so. It's just been a really tough day. First, I overslept and had to rush to get ready for school. Then my math teacher gave us this huge test that I didn't study for at all. And on top of that, my best friend got mad at me for something stupid and she won't talk to me now.

Oh, no! That does sound like a pretty terrible day. I'm sure your friend will forgive you though, especially if you apologize. As for the test, maybe we can study together later and help you out with it.
That would be great, thank you Just talking to you has made me feel a lot better already.
I'm sorry that happened. It must have been really hard for you.
Yeah, it was. I still can't believe she's gone.
I know. It's like a part of you is missing.
I feel like I'm lost without her.
But you're not alone. You have all of us here for you.
Thank you. That means a lot to me.
